stadium.name: The Unruly Yard
stadium.description: A field in the center of the city's most rebellious district. The stadium is covered in graffiti, the crowd is hostile, and riots are a common post-game (and mid-game) event.

stats.pregame_ritual: Drinking a shot of hot gravy from a dented tin cup.
Arranging their gear in a perfect, aesthetically pleasing spiral.
Testing the heft of their weapon with a series of slow, deliberate swings.
Kissing the Trollball on its stitched 'nose'.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Refusing to step on any lines on the field before the whistle blows.
Telling a terrible joke to the Trollball to 'loosen it up'.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.

stadium.name: The Glowstone Terrace
stadium.description: A massive, opulent stadium built on one of the city's main terraces, carved directly into the mountainside. The field is famously paved with polished Glowstone, and the stands overlook the bustling Confluence Market and the ongoing construction of the Guild's Skyport.

stats.pregame_ritual: Doing a terrible, clumsy dance to 'loosen the joints'.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Arm-wrestling the player who plays the same position on their team.
Speaking only in rhymes for the hour before the game.
Rubbing the Trollball on their armpits for 'grip'.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Going over the game plan drawn in the dirt with the team captain.
Covering their forearms in a sticky tree sap for 'grip'.
Eating a dandelion, stem and all.
Headbutting their own team's goal post (gently).

preGame:
## üéôÔ∏è HELLO OSTERRA! WELCOME TO THE UNRULY YARD!

Step right up, sports fans, and feast your eyes on the most beautiful sight in the realm: a literal riot waiting to happen! We are live in the heart of New Monteforte at **The Unruly Yard**, and boy, let me tell you, the graffiti on the walls is almost as colorful as the language being hurled by this hostile crowd! It‚Äôs Game 2 of the Losers Bracket playoffs, and the stakes are higher than a mountain giant on stilts! The **New Monteforte Chaos Creatures** are sitting pretty with a 1-0 lead, while **The Confluence Captains** are looking to avoid a total sweep and a one-way ticket to the off-season. üèüÔ∏èüß®

The atmosphere is absolutely electric! I see the local Monteforte fans testing the stability of the scaffolding‚Äîwhich looks like it was built by a drunken goblin‚Äîwhile the Captains try to keep their composure. Speaking of composure, I just saw **Ladew Evelina** chug another raw egg, shell and all! That‚Äôs the kind of calcium-rich grit you need when you're facing elimination! On the other side, **Alben Diantha** is dipping his hands into a bucket of ice-cold well water. I hope he‚Äôs ready, because it‚Äôs about to get scorching hot out there! ü•öüßä

Now, don't forget, folks, we‚Äôve got an open bar situation tonight, and the players are taking full advantage! **Carnahan Laud** looks like she‚Äôs had a few too many pre-game ales, but in Trollball, a little liquid courage goes a long way toward ignoring a broken femur! The Guild of the Black Sky may have the money, but do they have the stomach for the Chaos Creatures' brand of rebellion? Let‚Äôs find out! Grab your helmets and hold onto your teeth, because the whistle is about to blow! üçª‚öîÔ∏è
postGame:
## üèÜ THE CHAOS CONTINUES! CREATURES SWEEP THE SERIES!

Holy Mackerel, what a humdinger of a match! My demonic heart is fluttering like a trapped soul! The **New Monteforte Chaos Creatures** have defended their home turf with a thrilling 5-4 victory over **The Confluence Captains**, officially sweeping the series 2-0! It was a symphony of violence, a masterpiece of mayhem, and a total disaster for the Guild's favorites! üèÅüí•

### ‚öîÔ∏è THE FIRST HALF BLOOD-BATH
The game started with **Belding Chloe** snatching up the Trollball and immediately proving why she‚Äôs the Captains' most feared presence. She didn't just run; she flattened **Wolbrom Ariella** so hard I think I saw her ancestors flinch! But the Chaos Creatures didn't stay down for long. **Placido Kora**, wielding that wicked Seax, launched a stunning shot from Home Field that sailed through the hoop for 2 points! The crowd went absolutely bananas‚ÄîI haven't seen this many chairs thrown since the last time Sir Tanos tried to read a book! üéØüî•

### üî® INJURY REPORT
Then, the real fun began! The Captains decided if they couldn't lead on the scoreboard, they'd lead in the infirmary. **Carnahan Laud** absolutely leveled **Tucker Hett**, and **Stephan Lisk** sent **Alben Diantha** to see the healer. Even **Urata Oriana** got a taste of the turf thanks to **Caves Cestar**. It was a regular meat-grinder out there! Of course, **Fogel Raynold** got his licks in too, putting **O'Conner Maighdlin** on the injury list. Pure, unadulterated beauty! ü©πüíÄ

### üèπ THE EQUALIZER
Just when it looked like the Creatures were running away with it, **Carnahan Laud**‚Äîprobably still feeling the effects of that dandelion she ate‚Äîunleashed a 2-point bomb from the Away Field to tie it up! We went into halftime with a 2-2 score and a field covered in more blood than a butcher's shop on a Tuesday. The healers had their work cut out for them, but as we know in Osterra, nobody stays dead for long! üèüÔ∏èü©∏

### üçª DRUNKEN DEFENSE AND SLOPPY PLAYS
As the second half kicked off, the open bar started to take its toll! **Tucker Hett** tried a pass to **Alben Diantha**, who dropped it like it was a cursed artifact. Then **Ladew Evelina** threw a wild pass that was intercepted by a very sober-looking Alben! You could tell the Captains were feeling the mountain wind‚Äîor maybe just the ale‚Äîbecause their coordination was slipping faster than a greased pig! ü•¥üç∫

### üèÄ THE TURNING POINT
**Boulanger Procto**, the man who loves a good spiral, showed he can move in a straight line when it matters! He broke through the line and **DUNKS THE BALL** right into the end zone! A classic 1-point play that put the Creatures back on top. But they weren't done! **Tucker Hett**, showing no ill effects from her earlier injury, fired a laser from Center Field for another 2 points! The scoreboard was lighting up like a wildfire in the World's Spine! üéáüî•

### üõ°Ô∏è THE CAPTAINS' DESPERATION
The Captains tried to rally. **Stephan Lisk** and **Behl Berstine** went on a tackling spree, sending **Wolbrom Ariella** and **Urata Oriana** back to the sidelines for a second time. It was a valiant effort, but you can't win the game just by breaking ribs‚Äîthough I certainly appreciate the attempt! **Caves Cestar** managed to sink a 2-pointer from Center Field late in the game to bring it within one, but the clock was the Captains' worst enemy. ‚è≥üëä

### üìâ THE FINAL WHISTLE
When the whistle blew, it was 5-4 in favor of the home team! The **New Monteforte Chaos Creatures** move on in the Losers Bracket, and the **Confluence Captains** are headed home to explain this failure to the Guild. I bet **Chairman Sir Garon Ironrock** is going to have a lot to say about this‚Äîprobably while standing behind a very expensive door! üö™üìâ

### üïäÔ∏è SHADE FOR THE HEROES
Where were the 'heroes' tonight, eh? **God King Sir Artorias** was nowhere to be found‚Äîprobably too busy polishing his celebrity image to get his hands dirty in a real sport! And **Nikos Thanae the Benevolent**? I didn't see him helping the Captains out of the gutter. It just goes to show, when the Trollball starts flying, 'benevolence' won't save you from a mace to the face! üïäÔ∏èüëé

### üèóÔ∏è STADIUM INFLUENCE
The Unruly Yard lived up to its name! The **Rowdy Crowd** kept the Captains looking over their shoulders, and I'm fairly certain a **Street Performer** stole **Deach Sharlene's** rapier during a scramble! You just don't get this kind of home-field advantage at those stuffy Guild stadiums. The Chaos Creatures fed off that energy like a vampire at a blood bank! üßõ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüèüÔ∏è

### üì£ THE VERDICT
So, there you have it! The Chaos Creatures sweep the series 2-0! The Captains are out! The Creatures live to fight another day! It was a match full of grit, gravy, and gorgeous violence. I'm Nok the Corrupter, and I'll be back next week to tell you who else is getting their head handed to them on a silver platter! Stay brutal, Osterra! üèîÔ∏èüèÜ

**FINAL SCORE:**
- ‚öì Confluence Captains: 4
- üëπ New Monteforte Chaos Creatures: 5

**SERIES RESULT: Chaos Creatures win 2-0!**
